Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8 MOORE DRIVE, DURHAM, North Carolina, 22709, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Fortrea Holdings Inc. provides clinical development and patient access solutions to the life sciences industry. It offers phase I-IV clinical trial management, clinical pharmacology, differentiated technology enabled trial solutions, and post approval services. The company serves pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device organizations. Fortrea Holdings Inc. is based in Durham, North Carolina.
